text: Bloodline Records is a Hip-Hop record label that was started by rapper Earl Simmons (DMX). They are owned by Sony Records, Columbia Records, and Ruff Ryders. == Current artists == *DMX *Jinx *Janyce *BZR Royale *Moneyman == Past artists == *Yung Berg *Loose Cannon *Kashmir *Big Stan ==Related pages== * List of record labels Category:2000 establishments in the United States Category:American record labels Category:Companies based in New York City Category:Hip hop
title: Bloodline Records
